title: Publisher Rocket | 2026 COMPLETE Guide for KDP
description:
Learn the full potential of Publisher Rocket in 2026 with this complete step-by-step tutorial designed for authors and self-publishers. Whether you're publishing on Amazon KDP or optimizing your book sales, this comprehensive Publisher Rocket guide covers everything you need to know. Learn how to: 
- Master Keyword Research 
- Find high-traffic, low-competition terms 
- Uncover profitable Amazon book categories, and boost your visibility with Category Research 
- Get keywords of your Amazon Ads
- Discover how to perform Reverse ASIN look-ups to spy on competitors and get valuable insights into what’s working. 
This 2026 Publisher Rocket tutorial is perfect for beginners and seasoned authors looking to sell more books and increase rankings.
